name: Yadom Hongthai
description: $YADOM is a meme coin inspired by "Hong Thai" (หงษ์ไทย), a traditional Thai herbal inhaler widely recognized for its distinctive aroma and refreshing effect. Commonly used across Thailand and Southeast Asia, it has been a culturally significant item for decades. The $YADOM token reflects the humorous and nostalgic value of this everyday product. As a meme coin, it does not aim to provide financial utility or advanced blockchain functionality. Instead, it serves as a community-driven digital symbol celebrating Thai culture, local identity, and internet humor. With occasional appearances alongside global celebrities such as Lisa of BLACKPINK and Central Cee, the inhaler has become a quirky cultural icon—making $YADOM a playful tribute to its legacy in a modern, decentralized format.
